医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
空气污染对全球人口的公共卫生不利影响暴露于高水平的空气污染中会导致各种健康结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/Adverse-public-health-effects-of-air-pollution-on-global-population.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/Adverse-public-health-effects-of-air-pollution-on-global-population.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2d69a202-e798-4bbb-a89d-e7491a6b5cab Tue, 25 Jun 2024 15:08:57 -0400 Adverse public health effects of air pollution on global population
世卫组织报告强调全球酒精和毒品相关死亡负担世界卫生组织 (WHO) 的一份新报告强调，每年有 260 万人因饮酒而死亡，占所有死亡人数的 4.7%，60 万人因使用精神药物而死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/WHO-report-highlights-global-burden-of-alcohol-and-drug-lated-deaths.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/WHO-report-highlights-global-burden-of-alcohol-and-drug-lated-deaths.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e11f4801-7d1d-48de-b416-a3c26d0078c2 Tue, 25 Jun 2024 15:03:00 -0400 WHO report highlights global burden of alcohol and drug-related deaths
使用真实世界数据评估药物相关的肝脏毒性根据英国大学佩雷尔曼医学院研究人员领导的一项新研究，目前评估药物相关性肝损伤的方法并不能准确描述某些药物对肝脏的毒性或缺乏毒性。宾夕法尼亚州。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/Using-real-world-data-to-assess-medication-lated-liver-toothity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/Using-real-world-data-to-assess-medication-lated-liver-毒理学.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bfb78348-0067-4892-a1dd-97624d3d2143 Tue, 25 Jun 2024 14:57:15 -0400 Using real-world data to assess medication-related liver toxicity
威尔康奈尔医学公司获得 150 万美元资助用于预测前列腺癌骨转移威尔康奈尔医学院获得了美国国防部前列腺癌研究计划的 150 万美元拨款，用于开发新方法，利用疾病早期采集的肿瘤样本来预测前列腺癌男性的癌细胞扩散到骨骼的情况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/Weill-Cornell-Medicine-receives-2415M-grant-to-predict-prostate-cancer-bone-metastasis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/Weill-Cornell-Medicine-receives-2415M-grant-to-predict-prostate-cancer-bone-metastasis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ac4ad24f-8c9a-49c1-a5dc-67e446e5bd6d Tue, 25 Jun 2024 14:50:13 -0400 Weill Cornell Medicine receives $1.5M grant to predict prostate cancer bone metastasis
新的光检测方法改进了食品污染物的筛查有时，食品会因某种污染而被召回。对于此类产品的消费者来说，召回可能会引发对其饮食安全性和可靠性的怀疑。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/New-light-based-detection-method-improves-screening-for-food-contaminants.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/New-light-based-detection-method-improves-screening-for-food-contaminants.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d115d7ef-37ea-4c1e-80b7-c9aeb2b57783 Tue, 25 Jun 2024 14:21:00 -0400 New light-based detection method improves screening for food contaminants
MRI 连接组预测早期帕金森病的灰质萎缩进展根据北美放射学会 (RSNA) 期刊《放射学》今天发表的一项研究，MRI 显示的大脑结构和功能组织可以预测早期轻度帕金森病患者脑萎缩的进展情况）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/MRI-connectome-predicts-gray-matter-atropy-progression-in-early-Parkinsons-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/MRI-connectome-predicts-gray-matter-atropy-progression-in-early-Parkinsons-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2d950ef2-b7dd-4098-ba0b-95213565cf8c Tue, 25 Jun 2024 11:25:28 -0400 MRI connectome predicts gray matter atrophy progression in early Parkinson's disease
Sapio Sciences 推出 Sapio GMP LIMS，为独特的制造工艺提供无与伦比的灵活性https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/Sapio-Sciences-Introduces-Sapio-GMP-LIMS-Offering-Unmatched-Flexibility-for-Unique-Manufacturing-Processes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/Sapio-Sciences-Introduces-Sapio-GMP-LIMS-Offering-Unmatched-Flexibility-for-Unique-Manufacturing-Processes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2ea830cd-e640-4dcb-952b-92c9432556b3 Tue, 25 Jun 2024 11:18:00 -0400 Sapio Sciences Introduces Sapio GMP LIMS Offering Unmatched Flexibility for Unique Manufacturing Processes
结肠的单图像 3D 建模可以实现快速疾病诊断科学家仅使用胶囊内窥镜相机拍摄的单张图像就成功创建了结肠的三维模型。这种新方法提供了更好的图像，可以帮助专家更快地检测疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/Single-image-3D-modeling-of-the-colon-can-enable-rapid-disease-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/Single-image-3D-modeling-of-the-colon-can-enable-rapid-disease-diagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5f0c1842-a714-48a1-a160-1df75e06c7e6 Tue, 25 Jun 2024 11:17:35 -0400 Single-image 3D modeling of the colon can enable rapid disease diagnosis
新的 MDMA 变体可能成为安全心理治疗应用的有希望的替代品使用活性成分 3,4-亚甲二氧基-N-甲基苯丙胺 (MDMA)（俗称“摇头丸”）支持创伤后应激障碍等精神疾病的心理治疗正在全世界范围内进行讨论。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/New-MDMA-variants-could-be-promising-alternatives-for-safe-psychotherapeutic-applications.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/New-MDMA-variants-could-be-promising-alternatives-for-safe-psychotherapeutic-applications.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bbd9a4e6-9bf3-4791-a2da-f4aa3b57af81 Tue, 25 Jun 2024 11:05:00 -0400 New MDMA variants could be promising alternatives for safe psychotherapeutic applications
睡眠模式揭示隐藏的健康线索您的睡眠追踪器可能会为您提供的信息不仅仅是您的睡眠信息，具体而言，它可能会为您提供有关糖尿病和睡眠呼吸暂停等慢性病以及 COVID-19 等疾病的信息。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/Sleep-patterns-reveal-hidden-health-clues.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/Sleep-patterns-reveal-hidden-health-clues.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bbe2148f-c567-41e7-aa3f-0f7c5cf02376 Tue, 25 Jun 2024 10:58:12 -0400 Sleep patterns reveal hidden health clues
